ha, it's summer vacation at last!! Despite of my prediction, the first thing that I had to do when I was set free was "part-time job" If you know me, you can easily tell what I'd do at a holiday night. If you've guessed "watching movie," yeah, you are right. Tonight's choice was "Mystic River" It's a nice film, I have to tell you. I liked it very much, though it's a really sad story. It's not a simple "who's done it?" story, so don't expect "a good-looking cop investigating a murder case, and falls in love with another good-looking figure"type entertainmnent. The theme is much about emotions and mental struggles within characters. My best recommendation ;) well, now I'm going to watch next film, "Secondhand Lions" XD

Most of my final projects are done, and I'm done too. I finally finished watching the film "the Pianist" I've rentaled it twice, yet I have been so occupied until tonight. It wasn't bad, but I didn't like it as I had expected to. too slow, probably. 2 more days to suffer, and it's long expected summer vacation. the first thing I'm going to do? well, nothing. I mean "nothing" I'll do nothing, and enjoy feeling of being bored. Oh, it suddenly came up to my mind that I forgot to add something to my American Beauty sebsite. I wanted to point out that it's kind of interesting that Lester and Jane both used a word "spectacular" to describe thier lives. Another long expected thing beside summer vacation is tomorrow's lunch. Pizza Hut!! XD
It seems that I don't even have a time to get a nice, sound sleep. For weeks I haven't had a single dayoff.

Agent Smith in Matrix said that "the best thing of being me is that there's a lot of me." I cannot think of any advantages of being me, but I can tell that the worst thing of being me is that I am too easy. Today a guy walk into our cafe and asked for money (30 or 40 NT). He said that he was a vagabunt and hadn't eat anything for couple of days, so that he was starving. I did not believe him, but I handed him a 50 NT coin anyhow. After the guy left, my colleague said I was so stupid to do that, and that I was not helping him, but spoiling him. Though she was right, I did not care, for I though it was acceptable price to get rid of that guy. I am always too easy to give away. Somethings I lost, I can earn them again. However, somethings are lost forever. The other bad thing of being me is that my learning always comes too late.
Two French movies La Gloire de Mon Pere (父親的驕傲) Le Chateau de Ma Mere (母親的城堡) I saw these two films long, long time ago. Wish to have them in DVD...

I intended to wake up early, I realy did (when I say "early", it means around noon.) The fact is I've just woken up and it's 4:30 PM now. What a meaningful day...ha Though the most painful American Literature examination is over, I still got couple of more final projects to work on, and I've started none of them...great. I got part-time job later today, hope I'll get my pay today, for 5th of each month is payday, but I haven't got it. I'm not saying that my boss is stingy, he is a great guy, he really is. It's just that I haven't had any shift since the day before payday, for final exam's sake. What am I going to do with those money? mm...let me think...shopping around? AGAIN ?
